content:
Hi,

I solved the "Similarity" part of the pset but am not sure what the question means when it says that the function should be able to be used with the outputs of get_frequencies and get_letter_frequencies. Does that mean we need to build the calculate_similarity_score function with those functions? I built the function without using them. The same thing is suggested in part 6 and I'm not sure how to utilize the pre-existing functions.

Thanks!
subject: Pset 3 functions

content:
<md>You don't have to use pre-existing functions in calculate\_similarity\_score. I think it's trying to say that the output from say get_frequencies (a freq dictionary) should be a valid input to calculate\_similarity\_score. 

in terms of Part 6 about TF-IDF, that involves some frequencies calculations, so using a function you wrote earlier could be helpful.</md>
